name: EcoHome Attic Insulation Rebate
description: $500 rebate for attic insulation as add-on to other EcoHome rebate
fullDescription: San Jose Clean Energy offers rebates for attic insulation when done alongside other EcoHome electrification projects, improving home energy efficiency and comfort.
whatTheyOffer:
- $500 rebate for attic insulation
- Must be add-on to other EcoHome rebate
- Improves home energy efficiency
- Better temperature regulation
- Reduces heating and cooling costs
- Enhances comfort year-round
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a San Jose Clean Energy customer
2. Must be claiming another EcoHome rebate
3. Include attic insulation in project scope
4. Have professionally installed within 120 days
5. Apply as add-on with primary rebate
6. Submit documentation for insulation work
keywords: SJCE, San Jose Clean Energy, EcoHome, attic insulation, $500, energy efficiency, weatherization, add-on
